Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: How can I password protect my device?
Different ways to set up a password
responses: You can password-protect your mobile device with a complex password, PIN, or security pattern. When using a complex password please make sure its 12-14 characters long and includes a combination of numbers, ltteres, and symbols.

patterns: How can I secure my device?
responses: Here are some ways you can secure your device: Set your phone to automatically lock after a few minutes of inactivity, enable remote wipe, and set your device to erase itself after repeated failed login attempts (for example, erase device after 10 failed login attempts).

patterns: How can I improve security on my device?
responses: Here are some security options: enable location applications, disable lock screen features and notifications, display emergency contact info on your lock screen, regulary check and install updates, and use antivirus software

patterns: What are some security threats to avoid?
responses: Some security threats to avoid are: rooting/jailbreaking your device, installing apps from unofficial sources, and installing software from unknown sources.

patterns: What should I be aware of before installing an app?
How to tell if an app is legit
Should I download anything that isnâ€™t verified?
responses: Some app precautions you should do are: scrutinize and scan apps before installation, review the policies before installing a software, ensure the app isn't asking for permissions that are unnecessary, disable or uninstall apps you don't actively use, and sync and back up your data regularly.
